mapper.update: update t_baby_info set baby_name = #{babyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baby_birthday = #{babyBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, baby_sex = #{babySex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, baby_code = #{babyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, baby_name, baby_birthday, baby_sex, create_time, baby_code from t_baby_info
mapper.delete: delete from t_baby_info where id IN #{item}
mapper.update:
update t_baby_info set
baby_name = #{babyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
baby_birthday = #{babyBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
baby_sex = #{babySex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
baby_code = #{babyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
